thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: Juliette

author: Juliette
title: Juliette
text: I found flatmates.com.au an intuitive, easy to use platform for finding my new place. Being able to select the location, date and details of the place I was looking for to make my search quicker and there were still plenty of great options to choose from. The email updates also made it easy for me to contact the advertiser as soon as they listed a new place so I didn't miss anything. I found the whole process easy and almost effortless.
